summary: A set of unit tests for the command‑line UI utilities, covering console output handling, pager program selection based on environment and terminal state, and table rendering in various formats (plain text, markdown, rich text) with pagination and styling.
business_intent: Validate that the UI layer of the application reliably formats and displays information to end‑users, ensuring correct behavior of console messaging, paging mechanisms, and tabular data presentation across different environments.
